text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix GL703GE-DB71-CA 17.3" 120 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB SSHD HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Elden Ring. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix GL703GE-DB71-CA 17.3" 120 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB SSHD HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the ASUS ROG Strix GL703GE-DB71-CA 17.3" 120 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB SSHD HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Strix GL703GE-DB71-CA 17.3" 120 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB SSHD HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop!
